department: College of Computing and Digital Media
biography: Liz Friedman has been the Assistant Dean of Student Services in CDM since March 2008. Prior to working at DePaul, she spent ten years as Associate Director of Student-Athlete Support Services at Michigan State University where she earned her doctorate in Higher, Adult and Lifelong Education. She began her career in higher education at the University of Maryland-College Park where she earned BA and MA degrees. She oversees admission, advising, marketing and recruitment efforts for CDM.
